name: granny square christmas tree
yarn_weight: any gauge - designed for any gauge
notes:
crochet granny square christmas tree | easy christmas gift ( eng cc) #crochetchristmas #viralvideo 

 welcome to our crochet christmas wonderland! in this video, we’ll show you how to create a charming crochet christmas pine tree and beautiful crochet christmas tree ornaments. you’ll learn to make stunning crochet christmas ornaments and a delightful crochet mini christmas tree.

i hope you enjoy making it ☻ thanks for watching!!
